title: Swap selected Mission section image to uploaded plrbidozqqfdsyqmaxw2.webp

requirements.text: Update ONLY the selected element at XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/section[2]/div[1]/div[2]/div[1]/img[1] (the MissionSection mascot image) so its src uses the newly uploaded image file plrbidozqqfdsyqmaxw2.webp. Add plrbidozqqfdsyqmaxw2.webp under frontend/public/assets/generated and set the src via the existing base-aware assetPath() helper (e.g., assetPath('assets/generated/plrbidozqqfdsyqmaxw2.webp')). Do not modify any other elements, styling, layout, text, or images.
acceptanceCriteria: plrbidozqqfdsyqmaxw2.webp exists at frontend/public/assets/generated/plrbidozqqfdsyqmaxw2.webp and is served at /assets/generated/plrbidozqqfdsyqmaxw2.webp (base-path aware).
Only the MissionSection mascot elementâ€™s src is changed; alt text, classes, surrounding markup, and all other page elements remain unchanged.
The updated image loads correctly when the app is hosted under both '/' and a non-root subpath (using assetPath()).

constraints: Apply changes ONLY to the selected element at XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/section[2]/div[1]/div[2]/div[1]/img[1].
Do not modify any files listed as immutable in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
nonGoals: Do not change any other images (including hero banner) or any other sections.
Do not add backend logic or modify Motoko canisters.
